string.text: With all the fighting that goes down by the Barrier and the shape of the recon teams that come back, we need good medical supplies. Band-aids won't cut it - we need tourniquets, trauma kits and hemostatics. All we have here is fucking cold medicine and antirad! Can we rely on you?
Your help is appreciated, man. We gotta keep our boys alive.
We got a real problem with Monolith. Something's gotten them riled up, I got no idea what. Stack some of their bodies on my behalf and I'll reward you with choice goodies.

I'm planning on setting up a minefield around the Barrier. Those rock worshippers come through, they'll be blown to kingdom come! I'll take any explosives off your hands and give you something to fix your suit.
Nice gun! You know what would make it cooler? Some Freedom upgrades, that's what! Give it here, and pass the spliff, too.
